channel.title: Research and Development-mod
channel.description: So what do you guys think of [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/research-and-development/news/research-and-development-released']R&D mod[/url] that just came out a couple days ago?

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
Well, yeah, but I got ep1 too.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
Just started downloading it. It looks fucking awsome and I cant wait to play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Agreed this is what they should have done at the start of EP 1 for when you only had the Grav Gun that part still bothers me, it was trying too hard to be actiony giving you random puzzles to distract you.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
Just played through again, and god damn, this mod is absolute tops. Definitely on par with Valve’s work. They should get hired! The environments are gorgeous, puzzles intuitive and fun, gameplay great despite only having the gravity gun.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Altamont_Raven
item.description:
been playing through this mod today, but my computer sucks at it. godddaaaaammn intel graphics. Some parts of rooms are just fine, but other kill the FPS, even with everything on low. any suggestions? my comp runs alright with EP2 as long as I turn off the large portal on the horizon (r_3dsky 0)

other than that, this is a pretty cool mod indeed

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Soup is BACK!

It’s pretty safe to say that I am in da hizzouse.

EDIT: blap blap.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: I_amp_lt_3Tacos
item.description:
Sitten_duck:

If I were you, but i am not, so feel free to do what feels best for you, don’t play episode 2 just yet. I don’t know how much you know about it but it will leave you drooling to findout what happens next, and that could be awhile still.

Too late. He said he played through EP2 at a friend’s house in a different thread, and is probably trying to find something to pass the time like the rest of us. :retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Soup is BACK!

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Right4Dead
item.description:
Firebringer:

Research and Development was fun, but I don’t understand why everyone is saying the game is frustrating. I’m 13, and yet I figured out how to solve every puzzle in a minute or less. The mod was hilarious in some parts, Mr. Whirly being the best.

Mr. Whirly was the most frustrating part for me because it controls like ass and I needed to enter a console command if I wanted to exit it. But the levels in it were really fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
What an awesome mod.

Dl’d it today and beat it one sitting.

loads of fun.

Read full topic

If I were you, but i am not, so feel free to do what feels best for you, don’t play episode 2 just yet. I don’t know how much you know about it but it will leave you drooling to findout what happens next, and that could be awhile still.

It’d have to be a miracle if he hasn’t found out yet. In Episode Two that is.

Well, I’m probably gonna buy Episode Two in the next couple days, just got $20, and it’s only $15, so I’ll be sure to give this a whirl.

Zing.

If I were you, but i am not, so feel free to do what feels best for you, don’t play episode 2 just yet. I don’t know how much you know about it but it will leave you drooling to findout what happens next, and that could be awhile still.

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
I also liked all the little texture/decal hints about where to go/look too - I’ll have to replay it again so I can nuke that sniper with the nicely indicated gasbottles… saw them too late the first time thru.

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
Firebringer:

Research and Development was fun, but I don’t understand why everyone is saying the game is frustrating. I’m 13, and yet I figured out how to solve every puzzle in a minute or less. The mod was hilarious in some parts, Mr. Whirly being the best.

Just so you know, different people’s minds work in different ways. What may seem obvious to you won’t be as obvious to them. And it works in vice versa too.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
CTID:

Just to ask, I’m pretty sure it’s not the case, but can I use a game that uses the Orange Box engine? 'Cause I have Portal. Or do I need Episode Two in particular?

You need Ep:2 in particulars. Specific models and all that technical malarkey.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Soup:

That ain’t what I meant, and joo know it.

But that’s what I meant in the original post

CTID:

Just to ask, I’m pretty sure it’s not the case, but can I use a game that uses the Orange Box engine? 'Cause I have Portal. Or do I need Episode Two in particular?

No it really requires Episode 2 since it uses content from it. Sorry buddy.

Imonfire:

Forklift’s forks attached to a wall and moving a way that all they can do is destroy everything they touch is logical to you? Or plugs hangin’ right in the middle of a corridor made of metal wire is?

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Lamsey:

Read the stuff on the walls. It will give you a hint.

I found the concept of Ginger hilarious. Reduced body weight = having no legs. :3

There was some really great humour in this mod, and some really fun sequences like the railcart section and Mr. Whilrly… The boss fights were excellent too. The puzzles were nicely challenging in places.

Read full topic

item.title: Research and Development-mod
item.dc:creator: Lamsey
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

I got stuck trying to figure out how to get out of the room I woke up in. See my problem with this mod? I am just not kewl enough for it. =*(

Read the stuff on the walls. It will give you a hint.

Read full topic
